remarks: Define a function generating sets of integers using a _half-open_ range.  Read ` ( M ..^ N ) ` as the integers from ` M ` up to, but not including, ` N ` ; contrast with ` ( M ... N ) ` ~ df-fz , which includes ` N ` .  Not including the endpoint simplifies a number of formulae related to cardinality and splitting; contrast ~ fzosplit with ~ fzsplit , for instance.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Aug-2015.)
